nodes.bodyText: Perhaps just have an ImageDetails instance variable instead of duplicating the ImageDetails class within the AddImageTask class?
I think we can reduce code duplication using DefaultIngestStream to call run() from run(DataSourceProcessorProgressMonitor progressMonitor, DataSourceProcessorCallback callback).
It looks like this class is the same as the one in ImageDSProcessor. We should probably have just one version of the class that is used by both DSPs.
I don't think this class needs to be public.
